comment: Honestly, this class is the best I've taken in a while. He is a great lecturer and has some fun in-class activities as well. The group project was the most stress-free project I've had ever. His tests aren't really difficult, though they do have an essay portin.

Best professor in the MBA program! Great professional background; provides real world experience/application! Tests straight forward. Will have to apply theory at times. Always looked forward to his class! Very flexible!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Amazing lectures

comment: Macenczak is the best professor I've had in the MBA program so far. He's very knowledgeable. He's had an amazing career and lots of good stories that relate to our day to day. The class is overall pretty straightforward. There are tests but he gives extensive study guides and goes over every concept. Groups work is easy and straight foward as well.

Has great industry knowledge and always provides real-world applications of content. He provides study guides and his exams are multiple choice and free response/essay. Case Study and group project are straight forward. Overall just a great man.

Prof Lee Macen has a lot of industry experience, very interesting lectures, very good examples, is very nice and puts a lot of effort into his class. 3 exams, 1 case study essay, and 1 group project. He is extremely helpful.
I had him online so I cant say much.. but this was a typical management class. You have projects, case studies, and tests. Never contacted him but seemed like a nice fella.

comment: He is very nice and puts a lot of effort into his class. 3 exams, 1 case study essay, and 1 group project. He is extremely helpful. The class is easy. Gives you what will be on the exams. Would take again.

Great Professor with great life experience in managing people prior to teaching in college. Very respectful. Perfect lecturer, touching actual and real business situations. Easy to get an A if you do your work with precision, and manage your time properly. I would take his class again any time.
Great setup for this online class. It wasn't too material heavy like other online classes. Lee genuinely cares about your assignments and takes time to give back to his students! Take this class!

Mr. Macenczak is a great teacher. His class is also very easy, thankfully. I had the worst time in MGT 4001, so 4002 was like a breath of fresh air. His assignments are actually fun sometimes. He grades very fairly, and it is easy to make 100s. His tests can be difficult but if you do the study guide, you can easily make an A. I recommend him 100%!

comment: This professor is truly amazing. He responds to emails right away and is concise with his answers. I simply wish he taught more classes, so I could take him more. You will not regret taking this class, and I feel he really cares about his students.

I took this class online & it's an easy A. His syllabus is very straightforward. Usually 2-3 assignments (includes one quiz & maybe one case study or discussion) in McGraw Hill each week. Takes an hour & they're easy. Major group project so come up with a plan you have all semester to complete. Responds quickly to emails. Test are easy (use google)

comment: Professor is very involved and responsive to student inquiry. Lots of McGraw Hill busy work! Typical 70+ online homework questions that don't match anything on quiz, case study or exams. Discussion posts had real-life International business relevance. Plenty of extra credit, easy A.

The weekly quizzes are all on google and so are the tests answers, so they are very easy. The cases are difficult because you are not given all of the information, but that is not Dr. M's fault, its McGraw-Hill. The group project is a beast and very hard. DO NOT procrastinate it or you will not do well and its worth the same as all 3 tests combined
